sentences.english: Jesus was the man who performed miracles and put forward prophesies.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣是那行使神迹和作出预言的人。

sentences.english: This sort of epiphany waits in almost every bay and inlet of South Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 类似的神迹在南乔治亚岛的每一个海湾呈现。

sentences.english: Renew thy signs, and work new miracles.
sentences.chinese: 求你重显神迹，重行奇事。

sentences.english: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
sentences.chinese: 在敌人中间显他的神迹，在含地显他的奇事。

sentences.english: Why did this miracle speed up the plans of the Sanhedrin to get rid of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 这个神迹怎样加速了公会除去耶稣的计划？

sentences.english: 8Now Stephen, a man full of God's grace and power, did great wonders and miraculous signs among the people.
sentences.chinese: 司提反满得恩惠能力，在民间行了大奇事和神迹。

sentences.english: You know how to interpret the appearance of the sky, but you cannot interpret the signs of the times.
sentences.chinese: 你们知道分辨天上的气色，倒不能分辨这时候的神迹。

sentences.english: Another miracle will need to be recognized for him to become a saint.
sentences.chinese: 他还需要再次被认定行有神迹后才能成为圣徒。

sentences.english: Jews demand miraculous signs and Greeks look for wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 犹太人是要神迹，希利尼人是求智慧。

sentences.english: It pleases me to make known to you the signs and wonders the Most High God has done in me.
sentences.chinese: 至高上主对我所行的神迹奇事，我以为最好宣布出来。

sentences.english: Holy Spirit wants you to listen and muniments must be made to record this miracle.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵希望你们听从及记录这个神迹作为证据。

sentences.english: 43 the day he displayed his miraculous signs in Egypt, his wonders in the region of Zoan.
sentences.chinese: 他怎样在埃及地显神迹，在琐安田显奇事。

sentences.english: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan
sentences.chinese: 他怎样在埃及地显神迹，在琐安田显奇事。

sentences.english: Because of this miracle, Naaman had believed in the true and living God.
sentences.chinese: 因着这个神迹，乃缦信了那位又真有活的神。

sentences.english: Now Stephen, a man full of God's grace and power, did great wonders and miraculous signs among the people.
sentences.chinese: 司提反满得恩惠能力，在民间行了大奇事和神迹。

sentences.english: She read of the mysteries and the miracles, of penances and indulgences.
sentences.chinese: 在救赎和沉迷的驱动下她读了很多的神奇故事和神迹。

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
